hero.title: AI-native software, built to ship.
hero.subtitle: We build lean, intelligent web and mobile products — powered by LLMs and agentic workflows. Strategy, design, and engineering with AI at the core.

brandCard.description: AI-augmented full-stack development. We build scalable applications with modern React frontends, robust Go backends, and LLM-powered features — deployed on Kubernetes.

strategy.title: Product Strategy
strategy.description: Scope, roadmap, and validation. We make sure we build the right thing before building it right.

frontend.title: Frontend & Design
frontend.description: React, TypeScript, and modern frameworks. Minimal, accessible interfaces with production-ready design systems.

backend.title: Backend & Infrastructure
backend.description: Go microservices, PostgreSQL databases, Docker containers, and Kubernetes clusters. Scalable cloud-native architecture.

ai.title: AI & Agentic Solutions
ai.description: LLM integrations, agentic workflows, and intelligent automation. We build AI-powered features that solve real business problems.

about.title: Why work with us
about.description: We're a small, senior team that builds with AI daily — not just talk about it. Clear scopes, pragmatic technology choices, and steady delivery — from first commit to production.

approach.title: Approach
approach.description: Ship small, iterate fast, automate with AI

contact.title: Let's build something minimal
contact.subtitle: We prefer simple emails. Reach us directly — no forms.

foundryPulse.title: FoundryPulse
foundryPulse.subtitle: A modern manufacturing operations platform built with Next.js and TypeScript
foundryPulse.description: FoundryPulse is a comprehensive production management system designed for manufacturing environments. It features real-time factory monitoring, equipment tracking, and production analytics with a clean, responsive interface built on React and Tailwind CSS.
foundryPulse.conclusion: Built for scalability and maintainability with modern development practices and clean architecture patterns.
features: Real-time Operations Dashboard - Live monitoring of production lines and equipment status
Multi-language Support - Internationalized interface with next-intl
Role-based Access Control - Secure JWT authentication with granular permissions
Production Analytics - Data-driven insights for manufacturing optimization
Configurable Storage - Flexible S3/filesystem integration for document management

frontend.tech: Next.js App Router, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS

backend.tech: PostgreSQL with Drizzle ORM for type-safe database operations

architecture.tech: Service-oriented design with centralized business logic

ui.tech: Radix UI primitives with shadcn/ui styling
